question: What international status did Sibiu, Romania achieve in 2007?
true_answer: Sibiu became the European Capital of Culture along with Luxembourg.
asked_question_translated: Hvilken internasjonal status oppn√•dde Sibiu i Romania i 2007?
answer: Sibiu i Romania ble utpekt som Europeisk kulturhovedstad i 2007, sammen med Luxembourg.
answer_translated_eng: Sibiu in Romania was designated European Capital of Culture in 2007, together with Luxembourg.
